meanings.sent2: Every night, he redreams the same happy dream from his childhood.

meanings.definition: The act of dreaming again or having a new dream.
meanings.sent1: Her redreaming brought a sense of excitement and wonder to her nights.
meanings.sent2: The redreaming of his childhood dreams filled him with nostalgia.
meanings.sent3: The redreaming of the lottery win made her smile in her sleep.
meanings.sent4: In the redreaming, she found solace and peace in the chaos of reality.
meanings.sent5: The redreaming of the stars in her mind led to a new constellation of dreams.
